logText: You go to work and make $80.
You found a really stylish dress. It's $80, but you think it might turn some heads...
You thought that blouse was on sale, but it wasn't. You spent $50.
You got a great deal on a pair of shoes and only spent $20.
Somehow, looking up song lyrics leads to you finding some interesting dirt on a manager.
You spend an hour looking at Mermaid-Hime's costumes and taking notes on design.
